title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: The Modify Parameters dialog in Bug 9654 does not perform duplicated name validation on the first page. Additionally, the first and second column are not merged as they should be.
OB: Duplicated name validation is not performed on the first page of the Modify Parameters dialog. The first and second columns are not merged.
EB: Duplicated name validation should be performed on the first page of the Modify Parameters dialog. The first and second columns should be merged.
SR: To reproduce the issue, change a parameter name to something very long. Observe that the preview is cut off.
